name: The Simps 5
description:
Transition through the stages of life by playing through 13 minigames! Start new lives to play them all.

(play in Full Screen mode and do not exit to avoid bugs!)

(refresh to play again!)

Instructions:

Use Left Click, WASD, and 1/2/3 number keys to play the minigames!

Complete each minigame before the time limit.

Team:

Alex Nguyen

Alston Chan

Jamie Ip

Jonas Ong

William Wu

Assets:

Everything is original (except for the pillow)

Art was done by each team member

All music done by Jamie

Font: https://www.dafont.com/winkle.font

Pillow Image: https://www.google.com/search?q=anime+body+pillow&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=...
